summary: Research Interests My research interests are in translation, machine translation, cognitive computation, cognitive linguistics, metaphor theory and analysis, metaphor translation and cognitive neuroscience in the emotion and cognition. My M.Phil research in the school of language study and linguistics at the University Kebangssan Malaysia (2009-2012) was in this area of cognitive metaphor translation. It examined through cognitive analyzing the cognition and comprehending the notion of death and dying particularly in Hafiz and Persian culture and how dose metaphor chosen by Hafiz reflect his philosophy and thought toward death and how his construal of death transferred in the English.
